summary.span: 为 和 类提供基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示在以编程方式的情况下启用了输出缓存的用户控件。The class represents a user control that has output caching enabled in programmatic scenarios. ASP.NET 提供了多种方法可以启用控件的输出缓存。ASP.NET provides several ways to enable output caching for a control. 以下列表介绍了可用于启用输出缓存的方法：The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching: - 使用`@ OutputCache`指令，使输出缓存在声明性方案中。Use the `@ OutputCache` directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用类，从而使用户控件代码隐藏文件中的缓存。Use the class to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 使用类，以指定在其中你正在使用的编程方案中的缓存设置实例。Use the class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对的引用类，并将其设置的值为属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a reference to the class and sets it to the value of the property. 代码随后设置属性设置为使控件依赖于一个文本文件的对象。The code then sets the property to a object that makes the control dependent on a text file. [!code-csharp[BasePartialCachingControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/CS/dep1cs.ascx#1)] [!code-vb[BasePartialCachingControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/VB/dep1vb.ascx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CachePolicy As ControlCachePolicy

summary.span: 获取与预包装用户控件关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the wrapped user control.

value.span: 一个 ，存储与预包装用户控件的输出缓存相关的属性。

span.span: A that stores output caching-related properties of the wrapped user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，以编程方式访问与用户控件所包含的关联对象实例。The property enables programmatic access to the object associated with the user control contained by the instance. 对象可以以编程方式操作影响的用户控件的缓存行为和设置。The object can be programmatically manipulated to influence a user control's caching behavior and settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态加载和运行时以编程方式操作用户控件。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 分部类中， `LogOnControl`，它继承自基本类并向其应用属性。A partial class, `LogOnControl`, that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. - 与一起使用的用户控件`LogOnControl`分部类。A user control that is used with the `LogOnControl` partial class. - Web 窗体承载用户控件。A Web Forms page that hosts the user control. 若要成功运行此示例，请确保用户控件文件 (.ascx)、 其代码隐藏文件 （.cs 或.vb） 和承载用户控件 (.aspx) 的 Web 窗体页是相同的目录中。To run this example successfully, make sure the user control file (.ascx), its code-behind file (.cs or .vb), and the Web Forms page that hosts the user control (.aspx) are in the same directory. 该示例的第一部分演示如何应用于名为的用户控件`LogOnControl`，这意味着该用户控件由包装控件在运行时。The first part of the example demonstrates how the is applied to a user control named `LogOnControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `LogOnControl`对象的缓存设置可以以编程方式通过及其关联操作对象，可通过引用的包装。The `LogOnControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the that wraps it. 在此示例中，缓存设置来在页面初始化过程检查和更改满足某些条件时。In this example, caching settings are examined during page initialization and changed if some conditions are met. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/LogonControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/logoncontrol.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分显示与前面的示例用于演示用户控件缓存的用户控件。The second part of the example shows a user control that is used with the previous example to demonstrate user control caching. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/Logonformcs.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/Logonformvb.ascx#3)] 该示例的第三部分演示如何使用`LogOnControl`从 Web 窗体页的用户控件。The third part of the example demonstrates using the `LogOnControl` user control from a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/controlcachepolicy_loadcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/controlcachepolicy_loadcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与缓存的用户控件输出关联的 类的实例。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of the class associated with the cached user control output.
The associated with the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性，可从输出缓存中删除用户控件输出关联的缓存依赖项发生更改时。This property allows you to remove user control output from the output cache when the associated cache dependency changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性设置为使控件依赖于一个文本文件的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a object that makes the control dependent on a text file. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[BasePartialCachingControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/CS/dep1cs.ascx#2)] [!code-vb[BasePartialCachingControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/VB/dep1vb.ascx#2)]
